settings.heading: Detail:
settings.content:
• Officially licensed
  • Kits ready-made for assembly
  • No brush required
  • No glue required
  • No cutters required
  • Material: ABS
  • 20 movable joints that can hold various poses


Introducing our DIY Model Kit Toy – the ultimate experience for young builders and fans of the Transformer series (aged 12 and above). Imagine assembling your favorite Autobots from Transformers Rise of the Beasts with this kit featuring 20 moveable joints for dynamic poses straight out of the action-packed Transformers universe. What sets this kit apart? No need for messy glue, brushes, or cutters – just pure, simple assembly for hours of creative joy.


These kits not only offer the thrill of building but also serve as an excellent way to start or expand your Transformers robots collection. Each piece is meticulously crafted to ensure easy assembly, allowing you to create your favorite action figure with precision and attention to detail. The satisfaction of bringing your Blokees Figures to life is unmatched, making this toy kit a fantastic addition to your Transformers legacy.


Choose your favorite heroes like Optimus Prime, Bumblebee, and more from the Transformers Rise of the Beasts series. No messy tools are required with our assembly character toys – assemble with ease by snapping the bricks together. Crafted from high-quality ABS plastic, these figures are durable and detailed. They're not just collectibles; they inspire creativity, storytelling, and imaginative play. Reach past the big screen and build the ultimate Transformers collection to relive epic battles. Proudly display those Autobots on your desk as a tribute to your Cybertronian heroes.

settings.heading: Shoppings Tips:
settings.content:
• Complete Set Purchase: Each mystery box in the set is unique, ensuring a diverse collection without duplicates.

  • Single mystery Box Purchase: Purchasing mystery boxes individually may result in receiving duplicate figures.

settings.heading: Product Care:
settings.content:
• The package and manual contain essential information, so please retain them. Standalone batteries for lighting pose a risk to little children; keep them out of reach to prevent accidental swallowing.

  • For individuals aged 12 and above, please install under the supervision of a guardian. After disassembling, dispose of or recycle the batteries correctly.

  • If not in use for an extended period, disassemble. Clean the toy with a dry cloth.

  • Note: The package includes small parts. Avoid swallowing them, and ensure that children under three years old do not have access to them.

settings.heading: Shipping Terms:
settings.content:
• Orders in stock are usually shipped within the United State within 2-7 business days. A shipping confirmation email will be sent to the email address attached to the order once the order has shipped. 

  • Please Note: International shipping is not currently available.

settings.heading: Please Note:
settings.content: Custom items, sale goods, and gift cards are non-returnable.

settings.heading: Return:
settings.content:
You can return your Blokees order within 30 days of receipt. Please make sure the item you received is in unused condition with the tags and packaging intact. Start your return by emailing us at return@blokees.com. Upon receiving and inspecting your item, a refund will be processed within 10 business days according to the original method of payment.

Please Note:

  1. Custom items, sale goods, and gift cards are non-returnable.
  2. Blokees only supports company products sold from authorized sellers in the US and the company websites.

settings.heading: Please note:
settings.content: Custom items, sale goods, and gift cards are non-returnable.

settings.content: To contact Blokees' customerservicedepartment, please emailservice@blokees.comor fill out the form on the contact page.

settings.block_text: Enrich your Transformers collection with our officially licensed Classic Class figures. These authentic collectibles are a must-have for fans.
Enjoy hassle-free assembly with our ready-to-build model kits. No glue, brushes, or cutters required. Dive into the world of Transformers and the war for Cybertron.
Crafted from high-quality ABS material, our products are built to last. These durable toys can withstand countless adventures and battles.
Unleash your creativity with figures featuring 20 movable joints. Create dynamic poses and relive iconic Transformers moments. Get ready for action-packed play!

settings.heading: Transformers Classic Class Transformers Rise of the Beasts: Build Your Hero and Unleash the Adventure!
settings.text:
Meet the iconic characters, pose for epic battles, and relive the transformers story
Ready to assemble your own Transformers universe? Blokees Transformers Rise of the Beasts brings your favorite heroes and villains to life with brick-built figures that are as fun to build as they are to play with!

settings.block_subtitle: 10.5 centimeters in height, fully posable body glowing eyes and chest
settings.block_text: Behind the serene gaze of Arcee lies a hidden tempest of determination. Her graceful demeanor conceals a reservoir of strength that emerges when she transforms into her agile and fierce robotic form. Arcee's resolve can halt adversaries in their tracks, and her swift movements are as unpredictable as a storm. She knows precisely when and how to employ her skills, reserving them for the crucial moments when the Autobots and their human allies need protection.
settings.text_info1: A natural-born hunter and elite sharpshooter, known for her fearless combat style.
settings.text_info2: Newly designed female proportions capture Arcee's grace and inner strength.
settings.text_info3: Featuring character-specific hand cannon and accessories.
settings.text_info4: Perfectly recreates battle poses from the movie scenes.

settings.block_subtitle: 10.5 centimeters in height, fully posable bodywith glowing eyes and chest
settings.block_text: Beneath Mirage's composed exterior lies a whirlwind of courage waiting to be unleashed. His cheerful disposition masks the power that awakens when he shifts into his sleek and stealthy robotic mode. Mirage's actions can halt enemies with their unpredictability, and his agility is as elusive as a mirage in the desert. Like a seasoned warrior, he discerns the perfect opportunities to employ his abilities, saving them for the critical times when his fellow Autobots and the humans who have embraced them need safeguarding.
settings.text_info1: Exquisite head sculpt faithfully recreates Mirage's bold and lively personality.
settings.text_info2: A joyful and humorous Autobot warrior, yet incredibly brave.
settings.text_info3: Built-in illuminating eyes and chest for a glowing effect.
settings.text_info4: Equipped with a dedicated weapon for authentic battle poses

settings.block_subtitle: 8.5 centimeters in height, fully poseable body with glowing eyes and chest
settings.block_text: Behind the calm eyes of Optimus Primal is a storm of fury waiting to be unleashed. His gentle nature hides the power that lives within and emerges when he converts to his thundering gorilla beast mode. A roar from Primal is enough to stop enemies in his tracks. A pound from his gigantic fists shakes the ground. But the Maximal leader is wise enough to know when and how to unleash his strength, and saves it for when it’s needed most: to protect the Maximals he leads and the humans who have helped him make this planet home.
settings.text_info1: Eyes and mouth can glow, jaws can open and close
settings.text_info2: Capable of various action poses such as standing upright, sitting, pounding chest, and limbs on the ground.
settings.text_info3: Shoulder and back connecting joints allow for an extensive range of movement angles.
settings.text_info4: The entire body features a matte finish with a bright effect, faithfully replicating the textured feel of biological skin
settings.text_info5: Come with 3 pairs of hand types

settings.block_subtitle: 11.5 centimeters in height, fully posable body glowing eyes and chest
settings.block_text: Behind the calm eyes of Optimus Primal is a storm of fury waiting to be unleashed. His gentle nature hides the power that lives within and emerges when he converts to his thundering gorilla beast mode. A roar from Primal is enough to stop enemies in his tracks. A pound from his gigantic fists shakes the ground. But the Maximal leader is wise enough to know when and how to unleash his strength, and saves it for when it’s needed most: to protect the Maximals he leads and the humans who have helped him make this planet home.
settings.text_info1: Eyes and chest can emit light
settings.text_info2: Equipped with dedicated weapons. Can switch between single and double knives
settings.text_info4: The entire body features a matte finish with a bright effect, faithfully replicating the texture and feel of biological skin

settings.block_subtitle: 12.5 centimeters in height, fully posable body, with glowing eyes and chest
settings.block_text: The legendary commander of the heroic Autobots, Optimus Prime is a tireless defender of freedom, the common good, and the right of all sentient beings to determine their destiny. He believes every Autobot he’s lost in battle is too many. His drive to protect those who remain and the humans they live among, will not stop until the Decepticon threat has been neutralized and his Autobots have returned to their home world of Cybertron.
settings.text_info1: The car windows in the chest can be opened and closed
settings.text_info2: The body features built-in illumination With glowing eyes and chest
settings.text_info3: The exquisite detailing of the head, faithfully captures the intricacies to recreate the commanding aura of Optimus Prime
settings.text_info4: Equipped with a dedicated hand cannon replicating movie scene battle poses

settings.block_subtitle: 13 centimeters in height, fully posable body glowing eyes, block-style figure
settings.block_text: The menacing Terrorcon Scourge is the most fearsome hunter in the universe. He’s a frightening collection of mismatched parts, fierce, powerful, and patient. Scourge leads the Terrorcons on the mission of destruction they’ve carried out for thousands of years across thousands of worlds, leaving chaos and ruin in their wake. Scourge is ruthless, cunning, and treacherous – a cruel player to be avoided – and spells certain doom for any Autobot unlucky enough to become his next target.
settings.text_info2: Care for the Details UV Printed Textures
settings.text_info3: Equipped with weapon accessories faithful to the storyline
settings.text_info4: The entire body injection is molded in metallic color, upper body is made of transparent material for light transmission

settings.block_subtitle: 11.5 centimeters in height, fully posable body glowing eyes, block-style figure
settings.block_text: Bumblebee battles with an enthusiasm driven by his commitment to protect his friends and fight for the greater good of the universe. A trusted Autobot scout, he brings speed and bravery to every battle and every mission. Off the battlefield, Bumblebee is charming, optimistic, and a true adventurer, befriending bots and humans alike. But having fun and cracking jokes doesn’t make him any less of a warrior, and Optimus Prime and the Autobots know they can trust Bumblebee with their lives.
settings.text_info1: Wing-shaped on the back, with movable car doors
settings.text_info2: Chest armor with replaceable parts to faithfully recreate the storyline
settings.text_info3: Glasses can emit light and include laser processing, accurately reproducing the design of glowing eyes with precision
settings.text_info4: Equipped with a dedicated hand cannon, interchangeable hand types.

settings.block_subtitle: 12.5 centimeters in height, fully posable body glowing eyes and chest
settings.block_text: Nemesis Prime is the dark mirror of Optimus Prime, striking terror into his victims' hearts while wearing the face of their hero. He is imbued with many of the Autobot leader's abilities but lacks all moral restraint. Although his nature varies between being a clone built by Decepticons and an evil future incarnation corrupted by Unicron, Nemesis brings dread and destruction wherever he goes.
settings.text_info1: Built-in lights in his eyes and chest make him even more intimidating.
settings.text_info2: Comes with special weapons that let you set up his battle poses just right.
settings.text_info3: At 12.5 cm tall, Nemesis Prime is fully articulated for dynamic and realistic posing.
settings.text_info4: The whole body has a matte finish with bright effects, capturing its dark and powerful look perfectly.

settings.context3: In this series, the product ratio for the secret action figures is 1/36, meaning there is one secret action figure for every 36 action figures in the collection.

settings.heading: The Ultimate Choice for Fans
settings.context: Transformers Rise of the Beasts Officially licensed, easy to assemble, fully posable, and more!

settings.title: BusyDad
settings.context: These playsets are a breeze to use. No funky smells, and everything works like a charm. My little ones can assemble transformers bumblebee without any help, and cleanup is super easy. It's definitely designed for this new generation. A parent's dream come true!

settings.title: PlaytimeGuru
settings.context: Love how durable these sets are! They've survived countless bath times and still look brand new. They don't take up much space, and the quality is top-notch. Thumbs up from this happy parent!

settings.title: TinyHouseMom
settings.context: The size of these playsets is just perfect. Not too big, not too small, packed with features that keep my kiddos busy for hours in transformers beast wars. It's amazing how much fun they pack into such a compact space!

settings.title: CraftyMom
settings.context: Absolutely impressed with the quality of these playsets! The attention to detail is incredible, and I love that they're gender-neutral. My kids are obsessed with all the cool accessories. Definitely a win in our house! Although I only watched Transformers: Rise of the Beasts, I will shop all transformers studio series core class action figures for my kid! Let's enjoy beast wars off the big screen.

settings.title: GrandpaJoe
settings.context: I'm really impressed with the sturdy materials of these playsets. They hold up well during play and let the grandkids get really creative. It's great to see toys that can handle a bit of rough and tumble!

settings.block_text:
Fine motor skills: The small, interlocking bricks help kids develop their hand-eye coordination and fine motor skills.
Spatial reasoning: Kids need to use their spatial reasoning skills to figure out how to fit the blocks together to create the desired shape.
Creativity: Transformers Rise of the Beasts provides endless possibilities for kids to be creative and express themselves.

Unique Collection: Perfect for fans aged 12 and above to enjoy their favorite characters in a fresh light. With a diverse range of classic and modern characters available, fans can curate their own distinctive collection.

Family Fun: Transformers Rise of the Beasts is a great way for families to bond and have fun together. Kids and adults can work together to build figures, or they can use them to create their own stories and adventures.

settings.heading: BLOKEES TRANSFORMERS CLASSIC CLASS Transformers Rise of the Beasts: THE ULTIMATE WAY TO INSPIRE KIDS
settings.subheading: Ignite Your Imagination and Create Epic Adventures.
settings.text: Transformers Rise of the Beasts Blokees figures is more than just a toy. It's a way to ignite your imagination and create epic adventures. With 20 movable joints and no messy tools required, these brick-built heroes are ready to spring into action wherever you go. They can become brave warriors for battle at any time, and with our assembly character toys, the fun knows no bounds.

settings.heading: Join the Blokees Builders' Community
settings.context: Step into the world of collective creativity with Blokees! We are excited to see your unboxing and building adventures. Share your experience on social media using our special hashtags, or upload your creations to our interactive photo wall. Become a part of a community that celebrates every block and building!

settings.block_title: How do I assemble Blokees Transformers Rise of the Beasts figures?
settings.block_text: Assembling Blokees Transformers Classic Class figures Transformers Rise of the Beasts is a breeze! No glue tools required. Simply follow the step-by-step instructions provided in the package, and you'll have your favorite Transformers action figures ready for action in no time.

settings.block_title: Are these figures suitable for kids aged 12 and above?
settings.block_text: Yes, these figures are designed for kids aged 12 and above. They are not only fun to build but also safe for older children to handle. Younger children may require adult supervision during assembly.

settings.block_title: Can I purchase specific characters individually, or do I need to buy the complete set?
settings.block_text: You have the option to purchase individual Blokees Transformers Classic Class figures. Each figure is sold separately, allowing you to choose your favorite characters without duplicates.

settings.block_title: Do the eyes and chest of these figures really light up?
settings.block_text: Yes, the eyes and chest of these figures have built-in illumination, adding an authentic touch to your collection. They light up to bring your heroes to life.

settings.block_title: What materials are used to make Blokees Transformers Rise of the Beasts figures?
settings.block_text: These figures are crafted from high-quality ABS material, ensuring durability and precision in their design. ABS is a strong and safe material suitable for toy construction.

settings.block_title: Can I return my purchase if I'm not satisfied?
settings.block_text: Certainly! You can return your Blokees order within 30 days of receipt, provided the item is in its original, unused, unopened condition with tags and packaging intact. Please contact our customer service at return@blokees.com to start the return process. Please note that custom items, sale goods, and gift cards are non-returnable.

settings.heading: Detailed Manual
settings.context: We've included an easy-to-follow manual with your Blokees set. Find it in the product details section for all the tips and tricks you'll need.
